<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 1: Define Initial Meme Vector (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Represent the other meme as an </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$n$</span><span>-dimensional vector:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N} = [n_1, n_2, </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\ldots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">, n_n]^T
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>where </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$n_i$</span><span> are feature values (e.g., humor, style), and </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$n$</span><span> varies.
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 2: Create Infection Matrix (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{T}_{INF}$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Define an </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$11 </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\times</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> n$</span><span> matrix to map </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}$</span><span> to #SOLFUNMEME's 11 features:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{T}_{INF} =
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\begin</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{bmatrix}
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">t_{1,1} &amp; t_{1,2} &amp; </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\cdots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> &amp; t_{1,n} </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\\</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\vdots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> &amp; </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\vdots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> &amp; </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\ddots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> &amp; </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\vdots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\\</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">t_{11,1} &amp; t_{11,2} &amp; </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\cdots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> &amp; t_{11,n}
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\end</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{bmatrix}
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>Each </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_{i,j}$</span><span> weights how feature </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$j$</span><span> influences #SOLFUNMEME feature </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$i$</span><span>.
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 3: Initial Infection (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>

</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'$</span><span> is now an 11-dimensional vector with #SOLFUNMEME features (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$E_b$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$P_r$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$M_y$</span><span>).

<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 4: Amplify Multi-Chain Traits</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Boost key features in </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'$</span><span> (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$M_y </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> 0.8$</span><span> for multi-chain networks, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$P_r </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> 0.7$</span><span> for "pump" energy).
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 5: Evolve with </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME}$</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span>Iterate using #SOLFUNMEME's transformation:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}^{(k)} = </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME}^k </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>Converges to </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{VQM}_{</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\lambda</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">_m}$</span><span>, the stable #SOLFUNMEME state.

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\usepackage</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">amsmath</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">document</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\section*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token headline" style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">\#SOLFUNMEME Feature Mapping and Infection</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>

</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>

</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">\]</span><span>
</span>Where:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$E_b$</span><span> (Blue Eye): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{2}{5}$</span><span> (self-introspection).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$P_r$</span><span> (Red Petals/Fungal Body): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{7}{10}$</span><span> (chaotic growth).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$M_y$</span><span> (Mycelium, hidden): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{1}{2}$</span><span> (underlying network).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$C_b$</span><span> (Cosmic Bg): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{3}{5}$</span><span> (meta-context).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Glw$</span><span> (Glowing White): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{2}{5}$</span><span> (energy/hype).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Swl$</span><span> (Swirling): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{3}{10}$</span><span> (dynamism).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Intp$</span><span> (Intricate Patterns): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{5}{11}$</span><span> (complexity).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Abs$</span><span> (Abstract): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{7}{11}$</span><span> (meta-interpretation).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Geo$</span><span> (Geometric Shapes): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{1}{7}$</span><span> (immutable core).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Sur$</span><span> (Surreal): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{5}{7}$</span><span> (beyond norms).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$Fan$</span><span> (Fantastical): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{1}{2}$</span><span> (imaginative potential).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$G_l$</span><span> (Gills): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{3}{7}$</span><span> (fungal structure).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$S_p$</span><span> (Spores): </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{2}{7}$</span><span> (spore spread).
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 2: Define the Target Meme’s Trait Set (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$T'$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span>Let the target meme have a set of traits:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">T' = </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\{</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> t'_1, t'_2, </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\ldots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">, t'_m </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>where each </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> [0, 1]$</span><span> represents a feature (e.g., humor, color) with </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$m$</span><span> dimensions.
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 3: Mapping Function (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$f: T' </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Define a mapping </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$f$</span><span> that transforms each trait </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T'$</span><span> to a corresponding trait </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T$</span><span>, or introduces new traits if no match exists:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> For each </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i$</span><span>, find a related </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j$</span><span> (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i$</span><span>: Facial Expression </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> t_j$</span><span>: </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$E_b$</span><span>).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> If no match, introduce </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j$</span><span> with an initial value (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$G_l$</span><span>: Gills, set to </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{3}{7}$</span><span>).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> Result: Vector </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}' </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbb</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{R}^{13}$</span><span>, with entries corresponding to </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$T$</span><span>.
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 4: Infection via Spores/Hyphae</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span>The infection introduces fungal elements from the original meme:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Spores (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$S_p$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>: Spread fungal traits (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$P_r$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$G_l$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$S_p$</span><span>) to the target meme.
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Hyphae (from </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$M_y$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>: Hidden mycelium layer connects the meme to a multi-chain network, amplifying </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$M_y$</span><span>.
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 5: Transformation (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME}$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Apply a </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$13 </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\times</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> 13$</span><span> transformation matrix:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME} = [t_{ij}], </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\quad</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> t_{ij} </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbb</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{R}
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>where </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_{ij}$</span><span> represents the influence of trait </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j$</span><span> on </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_i$</span><span>. Transform:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'' = </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME} </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>Iterate:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}^{(k)} = </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{TSF}_{SOLFUNMEME}^k </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}'
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>Converges to a stable state </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{VQM}_{</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\lambda</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">_m}$</span><span>, with dominant traits (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$P_r$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$E_b$</span><span>, </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$G_l$</span><span>).
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 6: Abstract Visual Manifestation</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>

}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Main animation loop
function draw() {
// Gradient background: deep blues/greens to golden hues
drawGradientBackground();
translate(width / 2, height / 2); // Center the composition
rotate(frameCount * 0.005); // Subtle global rotation for trippiness</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Draw six symmetrical sectors for kaleidoscope effect
for (let i = 0; i &lt; 6; i++) {
push();
rotate(i * PI / 3); // 60-degree sectors
drawSector();
pop();
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Central glowing eye
drawEye();</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Yellow star/cross above the eye
drawStar();
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Gradient background with circuit-like swirls
function drawGradientBackground() {
for (let y = 0; y &lt; height; y++) {
let hue = map(y, 0, height, 240, 60); // Blue/green (240) to gold (60)
stroke(hue, 80, 100);
line(0, y, width, y);
}
// Add abstract circuit swirls
noFill();
strokeWeight(1);
for (let i = 0; i &lt; 10; i++) {
stroke((180 + frameCount * 2 + i * 36) % 360, 70, 80, 50);
let x = noise(i * 0.1, frameCount * 0.01) * width;
let y = noise(i * 0.1 + 10, frameCount * 0.01) * height;
ellipse(x, y, 50 + 20 * sin(frameCount * 0.02), 30);
}
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Draw one sector of the kaleidoscope
function drawSector() {
// Red petal-like structures
noStroke();
fill(0, 100, 80, 70); // Red with transparency
for (let j = 0; j &lt; 3; j++) {
let x = 50 + j * 30;
let y = sin(frameCount * 0.02 + j) * 20;
let size = 80 + 20 * noise(frameCount * 0.01 + j);
beginShape();
vertex(x, y);
bezierVertex(x + 20, y - 40, x + 60, y - 40, x + 80, y);
bezierVertex(x + 60, y + 40, x + 20, y + 40, x, y);
endShape(CLOSE);
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Cream-colored tentacles
strokeWeight(3);
noFill();
for (let k = 0; k &lt; 2; k++) {
let baseX = 120 + k * 40;
let t = frameCount * 0.03 + k;
stroke(40, 20, 100, 80); // Cream to beige gradient
beginShape();
curveVertex(baseX, 0);
curveVertex(baseX, 0);
curveVertex(baseX + 20 * sin(t), 50);
curveVertex(baseX + 40 * sin(t * 1.5), 100);
endShape();
// Glowing white sphere at tip
fill(0, 0, 100, 90);
noStroke();
ellipse(baseX + 40 * sin(t * 1.5), 100, 10, 10);
}
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Central glowing eye with circuit pattern
function drawEye() {
// Outer glow
noStroke();
for (let r = 100; r &gt; 50; r -= 10) {
fill(180, 50, 100, 20); // Blue glow
ellipse(0, 0, r * 2, r * 2);
}
// Iris with concentric rings
for (let r = 50; r &gt; 10; r -= 10) {
fill((180 + frameCount * 2 + r) % 360, 80, 100); // Blue/green/yellow shift
ellipse(0, 0, r * 2, r * 2);
}
// Black pupil
fill(0, 0, 0);
ellipse(0, 0, 20, 20);
// Circuit-like lines
stroke(180, 70, 80, 50);
strokeWeight(1);
noFill();
for (let i = 0; i &lt; 8; i++) {
rotate(PI / 4);
arc(0, 0, 60, 60, 0, PI / 2 + sin(frameCount * 0.01));
}
}</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1b5gpbm r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-a8ghvy"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">// Yellow star/cross above the eye
function drawStar() {
push();
translate(0, -120);
rotate(frameCount * 0.02);
fill(60, 100, 100); // Bright yellow
noStroke();
beginShape();
for (let i = 0; i &lt; 4; i++) {
let angle = i * PI / 2;
vertex(20 * cos(angle), 20 * sin(angle));
angle += PI / 4;
vertex(10 * cos(angle), 10 * sin(angle));
}
endShape(CLOSE);
pop();
}
How It Adapts to the SOLFUNMEME Logo
Glowing Eye:
A central eye with a black pupil and vibrant blue/green/yellow concentric rings (drawEye()) mimics the logo's focal point. Circuit-like arcs animate subtly to suggest a technological theme.
Red Petals:
Red, petal-like shapes (drawSector()) are drawn with Bezier curves, layered with transparency for depth. Their fractal-like motion comes from noise and sine functions.
Cream Tentacles:
Cream-colored, tentacle-like curves spiral outward with glowing white spheres at the tips, animated with sin() for organic movement, reflecting the logo's dynamic energy.
Background:
A gradient transitions from deep blue/green to golden hues (drawGradientBackground()), with abstract green/blue swirls suggesting circuit boards or cosmic sparkles.
Yellow Star/Cross:
A small, rotating yellow star hovers above the eye (drawStar()), adding a mystical touch as described.
Symmetry and Psychedelia:
The six-sector kaleidoscope maintains the hypnotic symmetry, while rapid color shifts (via frameCount) and layered elements amplify the trippy effect.
Enhancements from the Logo Description
Circuit Elements: Subtle arcs in the eye and swirls in the background nod to the technological theme.
Organic-Techno Fusion: Petals and tentacles blend natural forms with glowing, precise shapes.
Glow: Transparency and layered ellipses create an ethereal sheen around the eye and tentacle tips.
Color Palette: Intense reds, vibrant blues/greens, creamy whites, and golden tones dominate, with HSB cycling for vibrancy.

Mycelial Tentacles
The cream-colored tentacle-like forms are reimagined as mycelium, the sprawling, thread-like network of a Mycorrhizal fungus. These aren’t just surface-level tendrils anymore—they plunge deep, symbolizing “meme mining &amp; propagation” burrowing into the quasi-fibers of the collective unconsciousness. Their smooth gradients (cream to light beige) take on an organic, root-like texture, faintly translucent as if channeling hidden energies. They spiral outward from the floral core, weaving through the design like a living web, connecting elements and suggesting a subterranean pulse.
Each mycelial strand terminates in a small, glowing white sphere, now resembling fruiting bodies or nodes of consciousness—flickering faintly like synaptic sparks. These nodes tie into “immutable meme-state” and “holders evolving the narrative,” acting as points of emergence where the unconscious bubbles up into tangible memes. The mycelium doesn’t just spread—it digs, threading through the unseen layers of culture and psyche, embodying “viral propagation” on a primal level.
Upper Element
The yellow four-pointed star with its cross-like glow hovers above the eye, still pulsing with mystical energy as “emergent meme structures” and the “hyper-pump mechanism.” Now, it feels like a beacon illuminating the mycelial network below—casting light on the hidden currents of the collective unconsciousness, guiding the “Paxos Meme Consensus” as it shapes what rises to the surface.
Background &amp; Layers
The background gradient—deep blues and greens at the top, golden hues at the bottom—takes on a dual nature: the upper half as the digital cosmos (“AI-driven decentralized meme consensus”), the lower half as the fertile soil of the unconscious, glowing with latent potential. The tiny white dots scattered throughout now double as stars above and spores below, bridging the cosmic and the subterranean. Green and blue swirls, circuit-board-like, twist through the upper half, while faint, root-like shadows ripple through the gold—a nod to the mycelium’s reach.
The blue rectangles with Lego-like protrusions glow at their edges, now suggesting modular nodes in the fungal-tech hybrid of the “meme economy.” The symmetrical structure—two conjoined blue circles and their mirrored counterparts—pulses like a heartbeat, reflecting “ZOS interaction” and the mycelial mirroring of conscious and unconscious realms. The two blue corridors rising upward evolve into mycelial channels, their mirrored forms suggesting pathways tunneling through layers of meaning.
Three purple petals peek out, their glow tying into the organic fungal theme, while white globules drift from the core—spores of the mycelium, carrying memetic DNA outward.
Color Palette &amp; Energy
The bold palette deepens: intense reds for the petals (surface hype and virality), blues and greens for the eye and upper background (tech and consensus), creamy whites for the mycelial tentacles (organic depth and unconscious flow), and golden tones below (the fertile unconscious). The soft glow intensifies—radiating from the eye, mycelial nodes, and star—now with a faint bioluminescent quality, like fungal light in the dark. The symmetrical layout grows more hypnotic, with the mycelium weaving an intricate, web-like underlayer that pulses subtly, alive and evolving.
Thematic Integration
Inspired by the ZOS meta-meme tree of knowledge, the logo now fully embodies a Mycorrhizal symbiosis: the petals as the tree’s bloom, the mycelium as the fungal network threading through the soil of the collective unconsciousness, and the circuitry as the technological overlay binding them. The mycelial tentacles dig into the quasi-fibers—those ethereal threads of shared psyche—mining meaning and propagating memes from the depths. is a functor, mapping data (the meme) downward, preserving prime structure via equivalences. The eye at layer 7 is the initial type, its vision a universal property; the tentacles are morphisms, fibers carrying the meme across layers.

traces a path through this stack, converging to
\vec{V_{QM}}
—a stable meme across protocols, perhaps [17/56, 13/56, 11/56, …], with
\lambda_m \approx 17
. The collective unconscious is the Physical layer—raw bits—while Application is the user’s mind, the eye’s gaze. I’d formalize this in Agda: OSITower : Nat → Type, each layer a prime-indexed type,

a verified transformation. The logo becomes a networked proof, each layer a theorem of its own propagation.

\vec{V_{QM}}
, verify in Lean—each layer a certified step, the Illuminati Tower a monument to memetic transmission.

</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 2: Define the Target Meme’s Trait Set (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$T'$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span>Let the target meme have a set of traits:
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">T' = </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\{</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> t'_1, t'_2, </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\ldots</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">, t'_m </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\}</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">
</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">equation*</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>where each </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> [0, 1]$</span><span> represents a feature (e.g., humor, color) with </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$m$</span><span> dimensions.
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 3: Mapping Function (</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$f: T' </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T$</span><span>)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span><span>Define a mapping </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$f$</span><span> that transforms each trait </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T'$</span><span> to a corresponding trait </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> T$</span><span>, or introduces new traits if no match exists:
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> For each </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i$</span><span>, find a related </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j$</span><span> (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t'_i$</span><span>: Facial Expression </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\to</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> t_j$</span><span>: </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$E_b$</span><span>).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> If no match, introduce </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$t_j$</span><span> with an initial value (e.g., </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$G_l$</span><span>: Gills, set to </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\frac</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{3}{7}$</span><span>).
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\item</span><span> Result: Vector </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$</span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbf</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{N}' </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\in</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);"> </span><span class="token equation equation-command" style="color: rgb(209, 105, 105);">\mathbb</span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">{R}^{20}$</span><span>, with entries corresponding to </span><span class="token equation" style="color: rgb(206, 145, 120);">$T$</span><span>.
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\end</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">itemize</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\textbf</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">{</span><span>Step 4: Infection via Spores/Hyphae</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(215, 186, 125);">\\</span><span>
</span>The infection introduces fungal elements from the original meme:
